file
xx:\tomcat\doc\appdev\sample\build.bat
has an error
string #2 overwites value assigned to CP on string #1

1.set CP=%TOMCAT_HOME%\lib\ant.jar;%TOMCAT_HOME%\lib\servlet.jar
2.set CP=%TOMCAT_HOME%\lib\jaxp.jar;%TOMCAT_HOME%\lib\parser.jar
3.set CP=%CP%;%JAVA_HOME%\lib\tools.jar
